body_html: I didn't explain well. The code I posted works for me as well. The code that produced the error is a bit more complex (depends on tfrecords, etc.), but similar. Unfortunately I couldn't reproduce the error with simplified version of the code. It seems there is a problem that TransposeNHWCToNCHW is applied before DepthwiseConv2dNative, where instead it should leave NHWC. I have tried with tf-nightly and got the same error.

body: I didn't explain well. The code I posted works for me as well. The code that produced the error is a bit more complex (depends on tfrecords, etc.), but similar. Unfortunately I couldn't reproduce the error with simplified version of the code. It seems there is a problem that TransposeNHWCToNCHW is applied before DepthwiseConv2dNative, where instead it should leave NHWC. I have tried with tf-nightly and got the same error.
